hideIcon: Hide Document Icons in the Tree
hideIconDescForce: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
hintDesc:
• ● Made by zxkmm, open source under the MIT license.
  • ● If you like this plugin, please light up the free star⭐ (Star) for my GitHub repository.
  • ● Link: https://github.com/zxkmm/siyuan_doctree_compress
experimentFeatureHintDesc: The following features are in development. Please use with discretion
hintDangerousZoneDesc: The following features may have the following risks: conflicts with unofficial themes/ affects areas outside the document tree/ affects other plugins, please report bugs actively, thank you!
overloadFontSizeSwitchDesc: Once enabled, you can use the following settings to adjust the font size of the document tree
overloadFontSizeForceSwitchDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
overloadFontSizePxDesc: Must check the above switch to take effect
mouseHoverZeroPadding: Flexible Layout of Document Tree Items when Mouse Hovering
mouseHoverZeroPaddingDesc: Flexible layout of document tree items when mouse hovering, convenient for clicking and viewing titles
mouseHoverZeroPaddingForceDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
mouseHoverZeroPaddingPxDesc: default value is 4 which is the default padding of the first level notbooks
